RelatedSentence: Two Chinese workers from a Myanmar mine have been kidnapped by activists , the company and villagers said Monday .
Two Chinese workers from a Myanmar mine have been kidnapped by activists , the company and villagers said Monday .
According to the Wanbao Mining Copper Ltd. , the two 23 - year - old workers were abducted Sunday while conducting a land survey .
The activists reportedly belong to Yangon Public Service Network and have demanded a total halting of the project to secure the miners ' release .
